txt.en:
'The Orcs flowing from Khazad-dûm have found a powerful ally in the Wargs here in the Dale. This is a very bad thing for us here, as we cannot match Warg-riders in combat. They are too fast and too strong.

'If we want to fight this new menace, we will first have to strike at the Wargs. Head south-east, to Athmadhul, and thin the numbers of the Wargs there. Once we have done that, we can begin to think about the riders.

'Be careful, [placeholder], for the beasts are dangerous, even singly. Return to me when you are through.'
'The Wargs have been silenced, but there is much yet to do. The Orcs yet remain, and they are a dangerous foe.'
'If there are no Wargs to ride, there will be no Warg-riders to raid.'
The Warg-riders of the Dimrill Dale have been harassing the dwarf-encampment at Mekhem-bizru since it was first established.
Wargs can be found at Athmadhul, south-east of Mekhem-bizru.\n\nÓtam wants you to thin the numbers of the Wargs so there will be fewer Warg-riders to trouble the dwarves.
Ótam is at Mekhem-bizru, north-west of Athmadhul.\n\nÓtam will be pleased to hear that the Wargs around Athmadhul have been thinned.
